roomTypes.name: 2-Bedroom Townhome
roomTypes.description: Cozy mountain townhome with full kitchen, living area, washer/dryer, and outdoor deck — perfect for couples or golf buddies. Sleeps 4-6.

roomTypes.name: 3-Bedroom Townhome
roomTypes.description: Spacious layout ideal for golf foursomes or small families, with multiple bathrooms, full kitchen, and fairway views.

roomTypes.name: 4-Bedroom Townhome
roomTypes.description: Large residence for groups up to 8-10, with ample space for golf retreats. Many overlook the 4th or 5th fairway with Feather River views.

dining.name: Self-Catering Kitchen
dining.description: Every townhome comes with a fully equipped kitchen — cookware, utensils, and gas BBQ on the deck for al fresco dining.

faqs.question: What are the Townhomes at Plumas Pines?
faqs.answer: Private vacation rental townhomes adjacent to the Plumas Pines Golf Resort in Graeagle, perfect for golf groups wanting a home-base experience with full kitchens and multiple bedrooms.

faqs.question: Is the golf course walking distance?
faqs.answer: Yes — the Plumas Pines golf course is right next door. Guests can walk to the first tee and enjoy preferred rates and tee times.

faqs.question: What's nearby in Graeagle?
faqs.answer: The charming mountain village of Graeagle offers dining, shopping, hiking, fishing, and access to Plumas National Forest. Additional golf at Graeagle Meadows is minutes away.

contentParagraphs: Nestled in a tranquil, master-planned community just west of Graeagle, the Townhomes at Plumas Pines offer the perfect blend of mountain comfort and recreation. Positioned steps from Plumas Pines Golf Course, guests enjoy sweeping fairway and Feather River views, a soothing forest ambiance, and access to top-tier vacation-style amenities. Plumas Pines Vacation Homes & Rentals has been serving the area for over 30 years, making them the area's most trusted lodging partner.

These thoughtfully appointed townhomes come in various sizes — ranging from two to four bedrooms — and are designed for families, groups, or golf retreats. Every unit comes fully furnished with bed and bath linens, a well-appointed kitchen with cookware and utensils, washer/dryer, gas BBQ, satellite or streaming TV, and WiFi. Many feature spacious living areas with vaulted ceilings, outdoor decks with fairway views, and access to the Plumas Pines Rec Center with pool.

Start your mornings overlooking fairways or the Feather River, then spend your day at the Rec Center pool, tennis courts, or on the links. Walk to downtown Graeagle for shops, restaurants, and the famous Graeagle Grocery Store. End the evening with al fresco dining on your private deck or a relaxing soak after a day of mountain adventure. Select pet-friendly properties are available for guests traveling with their four-legged companions.
